incorrect_sentence: He is over there, turning in his homework.
correct_sentence: They are over there, turning in their homework.

incorrect_sentence: She went to the waterpark with her friends yesterday.
correct_sentence: They went to the waterpark with their friends yesterday.

incorrect_sentence: She wandered into a strange Tiki bar on the edge of the small beach town.
correct_sentence: They wandered into a strange Tiki bar on the edge of the small beach town.

incorrect_sentence: His hair is so long and lustrous, it must be all the grilled cheese sandwiches he eats.
correct_sentence: Their hair is so long and lustrous, it must be all the grilled cheese sandwiches they eat.

incorrect_sentence: She is always right, it is infuriating to be around her.
correct_sentence: They are always right, it is infuriating to be around them.

incorrect_sentence: I checked on him ten minutes ago.
correct_sentence: I checked on them ten minutes ago.

incorrect_sentence: They need to rent a room for they party.
correct_sentence: They need to rent a room for their party.

incorrect_sentence: Fabio wrote him a long letter, but he didn't even read it.
correct_sentence: Fabio wrote them a long letter, but they didn't even read it.

incorrect_sentence: She always had an interesting perspective on why her world must be flat.
correct_sentence: They always had an interesting perspective on why their world must be flat.

incorrect_sentence: His confidence would have been admirable if it wasn't for his stupidity.
correct_sentence: Their confidence would have been admirable if it wasn't for their stupidity.

incorrect_sentence: She spiked her hair green to support her iguana.
correct_sentence: They spiked their hair green to support their iguana.

incorrect_sentence: He stomped on his fruit loops and thus became a cereal killer.
correct_sentence: They stomped on their fruit loops and thus became a cereal killer.

incorrect_sentence: He ate the french fries knowing they would be his last meal.
correct_sentence: They ate the french fries knowing they would be their last meal.

incorrect_sentence: As he waited for the shower to warm, he noticed that he could hear water change temperature.
correct_sentence: As they waited for the shower to warm, they noticed that they could hear water change temperature.

incorrect_sentence: She did nothing as the raccoon attacked her bag of food.
correct_sentence: They did nothing as the raccoon attacked their bag of food.
